Detailed Description

Function Documentation

int __cvmx_helper_loop_enable ( int  xiface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Bringup and enable a LOOP interface. After this call packet I/O should be fully functional. This is called with IPD enabled but PKO disabled.

Parameters:
xiface Interface to bring up
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Bringup and enable a LOOP interface. After this call packet I/O should be fully functional. This is called with IPD enabled but PKO disabled.

Parameters:
interface Interface to bring up
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int __cvmx_helper_loop_enumerate ( int  xiface  ) 
int __cvmx_helper_loop_probe ( int  xiface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Probe a LOOP interface and determine the number of ports connected to it. The LOOP interface should still be down after this call.

Parameters:
xiface Interface to probe
Returns:
Number of ports on the interface. Zero to disable.
